Comments_List: Learned Indonesian language and culture. Pretty hype.
I built on my skills to develop a more firm grasp of the Indonesian language while also learning valuable information about Indonesian culture.
I learned a lot about Indonesian culture as well as the language.
I learned more of the Indonesian language as well as the culture that Indonesia has to offer. This includes grammatical, practical, oral, and literal aspects.
I learned more advanced words and phrases in the Indonesian language, along with much new information about the culture and traditions of Indonesia.
I furthered my knowledge of Indonesian language and culture.
Awesome class. Would recommend to anybody.
how to have a smooth conversation in indonesian. learned so much about the culture. coolest class ive ever taken
Everything is fantastic
This is an incredible, engaging course. The cooperative learning environment promotes learning while also making the class enjoyable.
Very fun and engaging class, very interesting and the best language!

The strengths of this course include the level of engagement, interest, fun, and manageability. This course could improve with a slightly better structure to the material; although, the course is very nice as it is.
The professor of this class is extremely engaging, a wonderful teacher, and gives great feedback to help her students perform the best they can in her class.
No weaknesses. Bu was a great hands on teacher.
no weaknesses. greatly constructed class and ran smoothly. maximized enjoyment and learning. pushed students to learn more and want to do so
I love how interactive the course is. Bu Dinny does a great job of emphasizing the listening aspect of learning the language. Not having class every day would be nice but that is just L1-4
Yes. Learn a new culture and have a damn good time. Awesome profs and TAs that care.
I would absolutely recommend to another student. The class is enjoyable, engaging and worthwhile.
Absolutely, favorite class! Best way to start the day and have fun with a cool language and learn about an interesting country.
I would definitely recommend this course to another student. It is very fun, and you learn a lot as a student.
Yes!!
Yes, it is a great class and language to begin in college.
Absolutely.
yes! wonderful course, dinny is the most wonderful instructor and I learned so much more than I thought I would.
Yes. Bu is a great teacher
